explanation: [0-0] In a field of yellow grass, a hand holds an orange stick. Placed throughout the grass are a large orange toy frog, a blue toy frog, a black toy frog, a green toy frog, a yellow toy frog, a multi-colored small toy frog, and a red toy frog.

[0-6] A hand holding the orange stick scrapes it once across the back of the orange toy frog. Next, the hand uses a blue stick to scrape three times across the back of the blue toy frog. The hand then uses a green stick to scrape three times across the back of the green toy frog. Finally, the left hand picks up the multi-colored toy frog as the right hand uses a dark blue stick to scrape three times across its back.
